links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = if n <= 9 then n else (if n mod 10 = 0 then a(n/10) else 10*a(floor(n/10)) + n mod 10). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 02 2012]
maple: noz:=proc(n) local a,t1,i,j; a:=0; t1:=convert(n,base,10); for i from 1 to nops(t1) do j:=t1[nops(t1)+1-i]; if j <> 0 then a := 10*a+j; fi; od: a; end;[seq(f(n),n=1..200)]; # From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 11 2014
prog: (Haskell)a004719 = read . filter (/= '0') . show :: Integer -> Integer-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 02 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
